name: HODL
description: This project embraces the "HODL" meme, which humorously encourages holders to "Hold On for Dear Life" through market volatility. While holders HODL, this project will reward long-term holders with unique tokenomics. It leverages the Solana ecosystem combined with Meteora platform to power auto-liquidity, token burns for scarcity, and passive singled-sided staking ("Stake2Earn") rewards. Focused on financial empowerment, it promotes wealth-building through a community-driven approach, encouraging HODL-ing over trading.
